summary: A village girl agrees to a marriage to a king she has never met after he sends her a photograph of himself. But the man in the photograph is not the king but his most loyal slave, the handsome but mute Shankar.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Madhuri Dixit|Amrish Puri|Ranjeet|Salim Ghouse|Deepshikha Nagpal|Ashok Saraf|Jack Gaud|Suresh Chatwal|Mohnish Bahl|Ram Mohan|Kunickaa Sadanand|Himani Shivpuri|Vikas Anand|Pradeep Singh Rawat|Dev Malhotra|Memon Mohsin|Master Wicky|Prem|Shabana|Pushpa|Ram Singh|Binda|Robert|Sunil Rodrigues|Johnny Lever|Shubha Khote|Razak Khan
title: Koyla
